inclusion.criterion: Adult patients over 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients presenting with a pituitary nodule presumed to be resectable on pre-operative assessment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject capable of giving informed consent and participating in the process of consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant women as determined by urinary or serum beta human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) within 72 hours of surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of anaphylactic reactions to OTL38
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a known allergy to Benadryl
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man with Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. His lab study shows the IGF-1 level of 4.5 ULN adjusted by sex and age.
